level.text: The Executive Director may interrupt on-line lottery operations services to an agent without notice or prior hearing for one of the following reasons:
Failure to make prompt payment to the Agency according to ยง305;
Failure to notify the Agency prior to a substantial change of ownership according to ยง206;
Failure to meet minimum sales standards established by the Executive Director; or
Violation of the provisions of ยง209.1.
The Executive Director shall deliver, by courier, a written notice of interruption of on-line operations services stating the following:
The right to contest the interruption; and
The right to be represented by counsel or any other person as a representative.
The Executive Director shall schedule a hearing within ten (10) business days of the receipt of the notice of interruption of on-line operations services.
